welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newport, a charming coastal city known for its rich history and breathtaking views. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty and unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at State Airport is dedicated to regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used for domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Block Island Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Westerly State Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights, providing a more personalized and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
